title: Project Emote
body: So i am having trouble with the new emote i got from project event cant not save it in my emote page says error code EM 03

replies.body:
Try logging out and back in a couple times to see if that fixes that EM03 error. I've heard a number of players were able to get it working properly that way.

If it doesn't help at all go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your game/network logs so they can look deeper at what could be going wrong.
